org.corfudb.infrastructure

Class BatchWriter<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.infrastructure.BatchWriter<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.benmanes.caffeine.cache.CacheWriter<K,V>, AutoCloseable

    public class BatchWriter<K,V>
extends Object
implements com.github.benmanes.caffeine.cache.CacheWriter<K,V>, AutoCloseable
    BatchWriter is a class that will intercept write-through calls to batch and sync writes.
